gobblin.audit.values.policy.column

Interface ColumnProjectionPolicy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractColumnProjectionPolicy, ProjectAllColumnProjectionPolicy

    public interface ColumnProjectionPolicy
    An interface that projects certain columns/fields of an input GenericRecord to generate a new GenericRecord that can be audited. The field locations to project are an ordered string specifying the location of the nested field to retrieve. For example, field1.nestedField1 takes the the value of the field "field1" of the record, and retrieves the field "nestedField1" from it

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<String> getAllColumnsToProject()
      A union of getKeyColumnsToProject() and getDeltaColumnsToProject()
      List<String> getDeltaColumnsToProject()
      Get the delta fields to project in a GenericRecord.
      List<String> getKeyColumnsToProject()
      Get the key aka unique identifier fields to project in a GenericRecord
      GenericRecord project(GenericRecord inputRecord)
      Project key and delta columns/fields of the inputRecord and return a new GenericRecord with only the projected columns/fields

    • Method Detail

      • getKeyColumnsToProject

        List<String> getKeyColumnsToProject()
        Get the key aka unique identifier fields to project in a GenericRecord

      • getDeltaColumnsToProject

        List<String> getDeltaColumnsToProject()
        Get the delta fields to project in a GenericRecord. These are the fields used to determine changes over time.

      • getAllColumnsToProject

        List<String> getAllColumnsToProject()
        A union of getKeyColumnsToProject() and getDeltaColumnsToProject()

      • project

        GenericRecord project(GenericRecord inputRecord)
        Project key and delta columns/fields of the inputRecord and return a new GenericRecord with only the projected columns/fields
        Parameters:
        inputRecord - the original record with all columns/fields
        Returns:
        a new GenericRecord with only getAllColumnsToProject()
